sort.price_asc: Preço: Mais baixo para mais alto

product.tax_disclaimer: * Incl. IVA mais custos de envio, se aplicável

locations.headline: Lojas perto de você
locations.who_will_pickup: Who will pick up this order?
locations.success_copy: We will send you an email/text message shortly when your order is ready for pickup.
locations.error_title: We're sorry but your reservation could not be placed.
locations.error_copy: There was an issue when trying to place your reservation. Probably some items have sold out meanwhile. Please check availability at a different location.
locations.error_invalid_zip_code: Please enter a valid ZIP code.
locations.error_no_store_found: We don’t have any stores matching this location, please check your inputs.

error.direct_ship: This combination is not available for direct ship, select a different option or check if it's available at a store near you.
error.reserve: This product is not available at your chosen location. Please select a different location.

modal.body_error: Ocorreu um erro inesperado. Por favor, tente novamente.

cart.coupon_was_added: O cupom foi adicionado ao carrinho!
cart.coupons_not_supported: Adicione cupons e vales presente durante o checkout
cart.reservation_hint: *Prices may vary from store to store and online. For Reserve Online orders certain state and local fees may not be reflected in the total. {shopName} is not responsible for the errors or omissions in pricing and quality.

errors.mixed_cart: We currently do not support Ship to Address and Reserve to Cart within the same transaction. Please update your delivery options and continue shopping or proceed to checkout.
errors.direct_ship_item: Check if this item is available for reserve at a store near you.
errors.ropis_cart_inventory: Not all of your items can be reserved. Please check the products in cart and change fulfilment options.
errors.ropis_item_inventory: This item is not available for reservation at the selected location. Check for availability at a different location.
errors.ropis_item_inventory_exceed: This item is not available in the desired quantity at {storeName}. {inventory} will be reserved.
errors.mixed_cart_coupon_removed: The coupon "{code}" is not valid for in store reservations. Once you have placed the reservation it will be available for direct ship orders again.

login.headline: Bem vindo
login.forgot_password_popup: Por favor, use o site do desktop para redefinir sua senha.
login.error: Seu nome de usuário e senha não correspondem a nenhuma conta

reviews.no_reviews: Seja o primeiro a avaliar este produto:

reviews.review_form_rate_error: Por favor selecione uma qualificação com as estrelas.
reviews.press_to_rate_with_x_stars: Pressione para avaliar com {rate} {rate, plural, =1 {estrela} other {estrelas}}.

scanner.instructions: Por favor mantenha o código de barras ou código QR no centro. A deteção é realizada automaticamente.

noResult.qrCode: Não foi possível encontrar resultados para este código QR.

access_denied.camera_message: Esta funcionalidade requer acesso à sua câmara. Por favor autorize o acesso nas configurações.
access_denied.geolocation_message: Para encontrar lojas perto de você, acesse Configurações e ative as permissões de localização.
